text: Pedro Miguel Angulo Arana (born 5 February 1960) is a Peruvian lawyer and politician. In December 2022, he became the prime minister of Peru under the presidency of Dina Boluarte. He left office a few days later. == References == Category:Living people Category:Peruvian lawyers Category:Prime ministers of Peru Category:1960 births
title: Pedro Angulo Arana
